name: Secret Agent Trilogy level pack for Crystal Caves HD
name_original: Secret Agent Trilogy level pack for Crystal Caves HD
description:
This is a freeware level pack for Crystal Caves HD, based on all the levels of Apogee's Secret Agent trilogy. This level pack contains 48 levels.

Note:

It's necessary to have Crystal Caves HD purchased and installed.
Crystal Caves HD is available through Steam and GOG:

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1330890/Crystal_Caves_HD/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/crystal_caves_hd
